助理团队

v0: A ruler cannot rule without many qualified assistants to help with the many duties that comes with such a position. This leader ensures only the best are picked for the job.
v1: 如果没有许多合格的助手来帮助统治者履行这一职位带来的许多职责，统治者就无法有效的统治国家或者地区。这位领导者确保只挑选最优秀的人来担任这项工作。
个人链接

v0: A special connection with our [Root.Owner.Ruler.GetRulerTitle] enables this leader to take on some of the workload when needed.

v0: A direct connection with our [Root.Owner.Ruler.GetRulerTitle] enables this leader to take on some of the workload when needed.

负面单元

v0: This leader deliberately targets civilians to ensure morale remains low among military targets.

保密者

v0:
The Moon is round and big, high in the sky.
Secrets whispered into my mind.
Watch the Moon, for it knows more than you.
v1: 明月当空照，秘密在我的脑海中低语。这些秘密天知地知我知，而你不知。

v0: This leader is careful about what information is revealed to both potential allies and enemies.
v1: 该领袖对于向潜在盟友和敌人透露哪些信息非常谨慎。
子空间通讯

v0: This leader's communication to our subspace communications network is stronger than most, allowing for less reliance on technological solutions.
v1: 该领袖与我们的子空间通信网络的通信比大多数人都更强，从而减少了对技术解决方案的依赖。
非对称加密

v0: This unit utilizes custom algorithms and encryption methods to keep our empire's data safe.
v1: 该单位利用自定义的算法和加密方法来保证我们帝国的数据安全。
自给自足

v0: This leader knows how to make do with what [Root.GetHeShe] has, and possess the skills needed to fix any problems on [Root.GetHisHer] own.
v1: 该领袖知道如何利用[Root.GetHeShe]手上的资源解决遇到的任何问题。
自主决策权

v0: This leader's increased autonomy allows for more than most.
v1: 该领袖拥有比绝大多数人更高的自主权。
本地决策

v0: This leader's increased autonomy allows for more than most.
v1: 该领袖拥有比绝大多数人更高的自主权。
零重力研究者

v0: A brilliant researcher with an inclination towards research beyond the gravity well.
v1: 一位杰出的研究人员，热衷于重力井之外的研究。
零重力研究者

v0: This leader works best with data that has not been contaminated by gravity.
v1: 该领袖适合处理未受重力影响的数据。
零重力研究者

v0: This unit values data from Zero-G facilities more highly than other sources, citing the disrupting effect gravity has on data-collection.
v1: 该领袖比其他人更重视零重力设施的数据，其理由是重力对部分数据的收集存在破坏性影响。
逆向工程

v0: This leader is known for reverse-engineering any and all foreign technology in [Root.GetHisHer] possession.
v1: 该领袖因对外国技术进行逆向工程的精湛技艺而闻名。

v0: This leader is an expert when it comes to formulating rules for our stellar traffic, enabling faster flight and transit.

星系分析师

v0: This leader carefully controls their part of stellar traffic, ensuring lower transit times.
v1: 该领袖仔细控制了他所在的恒星系的流量，确保缩短了运输时间。
星系分析

v0: Real-time analysis of space-weather allows for better manoeuvrability during FTL and sublight travel.
v1: 星系空间预报的实时分析可以帮助舰船在超光速飞行和亚光速航行期间实现更好的机动性。
地下情报网络

v0: This leader is of the belief that intelligence wins wars, allowing no leaks to the public or the enemy regarding military capabilities.
v1: 该领袖擅长情报工作，尤其擅长对有关军事能力的信息的情报保密工作。
地下情报网络

v0: This leader is of the belief that intelligence wins wars.
v1: 该领袖坚信情报能赢得战争。
地下情报网络

v0: Extra firewalls and encryption protects this leader's secrets from prying eyes.
v1: 额外的防火墙和数据加密措施可以保护帝国的秘密免遭窥探。
天堂工匠

v0: Taking matters into ones own appendages is how this leader does things. An expert in both the fields of Terraforming and Megastructural Engineering combined, this leader has total control when it comes to the design of artifical worlds.
v1: 该领袖是地形改造和巨型结构工程领域的专家，在人造世界的设计方面拥有极高的造诣。
